better_vanilla.config.title: Better Vanilla Config
better_vanilla.config.remove_modded_noti: Remove the "(Modded)" text from the title screen and "*" from the window title
better_vanilla.config.creepers_ignite_fr: Makes creepers blow up when they catch fire
better_vanilla.config.creepers_defuse_in: Makes creepers stop exploding when they are in water
better_vanilla.config.infinity_plus_mend: Makes the infinity and mending enchantments work together
better_vanilla.config.bookshelves_hold_b: Make bookshelves store books that you can take and put back
